name: 2. Monitor Marketing Job Boards for Growing Companies

nodes.name: MCP Client to Scrape as HTML

parameters.toolDescription: Scrape a single webpage URL with advanced options for content extraction and get back the results in markdown.

parameters.text:
=Scrape marketing job listing on indeed using the link below:
{{ $json.url }}

parameters.sessionKey: ={{ $('⏰ Trigger: Check Job Listings').item.json["Day of week"] }}

nodes.name: 📧 Send Job Alerts to Marketing Team

parameters.subject: New marketing job on indeed

parameters.content:
## 🟩 **SECTION 1: Trigger & Input Setup**

### 🔁 ⏰ 1. Schedule Trigger

* **Name:** `⏰ Trigger: Check Job Listings`
* **What it does:** Automatically starts the workflow on a fixed schedule (e.g., every morning at 9AM).
* **Why it matters:** No need for manual intervention — the job hunt starts automatically while your team sleeps.

### ✏️ 🛠️ 2. Set Search Parameters

* **Name:** `🛠️ Set Search Parameters`
* **What it does:** Manually lets you configure what kind of jobs you want to scrape:

  * Example: `"Marketing"` jobs
  * Location: `"Remote"`
  * Frequency, keyword variations, or filters
* **Why it matters:** This gives you **full control** over what jobs to look for, ensuring you always get relevant alerts.

> ✅ *This section ensures your workflow starts on time and targets the right kind of jobs.*

---

## 🟨 **SECTION 2: AI Agent with Tools & Memory**

### 🤖 3. AI Agent: Scrape & Understand

* **Name:** `🤖 AI Agent: Scrape & Understand`
* **What it does:** This is the **brain** of the operation. It receives your input (search parameters) and:

  * Plans the next steps
  * Decides what tools to use
  * Understands how to scrape, parse, and structure data

#### 🔗 Connected Sub-Nodes:

##### 🧠 OpenAI Chat Model

* **Name:** `🧠 OpenAI: LLM Brain`
* **Purpose:** Provides the reasoning and decision-making for the AI Agent (using ChatGPT-style intelligence).

##### 🗃️ Simple Memory

* **Name:** `🗃️ Agent Memory`
* **Purpose:** Stores historical context and responses so the agent stays consistent and smart across multiple runs.

##### 🌐 Scrape Indeed (HTML)

* **Name:** `🌐 MCP Client to Scrape as HTML`
* **Purpose:** Uses Bright Data's scraping tool to grab job listings directly from Indeed’s frontend — even with protections like anti-bot tech.

##### 🧾 Parse Job Listings

* **Name:** `🧾 Structured Output Parser`
* **Purpose:** Takes the messy scraped HTML and turns it into a neat, structured JSON format like:

  ```json
  {
    "title": "Marketing Executive",
    "company": "Avatech Controls",
    ...
  }
  ```

> 🤯 *This section uses AI + scraping tools to autonomously gather fresh, structured job data without writing a single line of scraping code!*

---

## 🟦 **SECTION 3: Format & Send Email Alerts**

### 🧮 4. Format Job Data

* **Name:** `🧮 Format Job Data`
* **What it does:** Uses a **Function Node** to:

  * Flatten and clean the job data
  * Combine details into a neat format
  * Add emojis or Markdown for email readability

Example Output:

```
📢 Email Marketing Specialist  
🏢 Paleovalley | 🌍 Remote  
💰 $70,000 - $80,000 | 🕐 Full-time  
🎁 Health insurance, 401(k), Vision  
📝 Build and optimize email flows...
```

### 📧 5. Send Job Alerts to Marketing Team

* **Name:** `📧 Gmail: Send Job Alerts`
* **What it does:** Sends **one beautifully formatted email per job** directly to your marketing team’s inbox.
* You can customize:

  * Subject line: `🚀 New Marketing Job Alert`
  * Recipients
  * Styling using HTML/Markdown

> 💌 *Your team receives curated, ready-to-review job leads — no searching required!*

---

=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

# 🎯 **AI-Powered Job Scraper Workflow**

*Scrape Remote Marketing Jobs from Indeed & Auto-Email to Your Team*

---

## 🟩 **SECTION 1: Trigger & Input Setup**

### 🔁 ⏰ 1. Schedule Trigger

* **Name:** `⏰ Trigger: Check Job Listings`
* **What it does:** Automatically starts the workflow on a fixed schedule (e.g., every morning at 9AM).
* **Why it matters:** No need for manual intervention — the job hunt starts automatically while your team sleeps.

### ✏️ 🛠️ 2. Set Search Parameters

* **Name:** `🛠️ Set Search Parameters`
* **What it does:** Manually lets you configure what kind of jobs you want to scrape:

  * Example: `"Marketing"` jobs
  * Location: `"Remote"`
  * Frequency, keyword variations, or filters
* **Why it matters:** This gives you **full control** over what jobs to look for, ensuring you always get relevant alerts.

> ✅ *This section ensures your workflow starts on time and targets the right kind of jobs.*

---

## 🟨 **SECTION 2: AI Agent with Tools & Memory**

### 🤖 3. AI Agent: Scrape & Understand

* **Name:** `🤖 AI Agent: Scrape & Understand`
* **What it does:** This is the **brain** of the operation. It receives your input (search parameters) and:

  * Plans the next steps
  * Decides what tools to use
  * Understands how to scrape, parse, and structure data

#### 🔗 Connected Sub-Nodes:

##### 🧠 OpenAI Chat Model

* **Name:** `🧠 OpenAI: LLM Brain`
* **Purpose:** Provides the reasoning and decision-making for the AI Agent (using ChatGPT-style intelligence).

##### 🗃️ Simple Memory

* **Name:** `🗃️ Agent Memory`
* **Purpose:** Stores historical context and responses so the agent stays consistent and smart across multiple runs.

##### 🌐 Scrape Indeed (HTML)

* **Name:** `🌐 MCP Client to Scrape as HTML`
* **Purpose:** Uses Bright Data's scraping tool to grab job listings directly from Indeed’s frontend — even with protections like anti-bot tech.

##### 🧾 Parse Job Listings

* **Name:** `🧾 Structured Output Parser`
* **Purpose:** Takes the messy scraped HTML and turns it into a neat, structured JSON format like:

  ```json
  {
    "title": "Marketing Executive",
    "company": "Avatech Controls",
    ...
  }
  ```

> 🤯 *This section uses AI + scraping tools to autonomously gather fresh, structured job data without writing a single line of scraping code!*

---

## 🟦 **SECTION 3: Format & Send Email Alerts**

### 🧮 4. Format Job Data

* **Name:** `🧮 Format Job Data`
* **What it does:** Uses a **Function Node** to:

  * Flatten and clean the job data
  * Combine details into a neat format
  * Add emojis or Markdown for email readability

Example Output:

```
📢 Email Marketing Specialist  
🏢 Paleovalley | 🌍 Remote  
💰 $70,000 - $80,000 | 🕐 Full-time  
🎁 Health insurance, 401(k), Vision  
📝 Build and optimize email flows...
```

### 📧 5. Send Job Alerts to Marketing Team

* **Name:** `📧 Gmail: Send Job Alerts`
* **What it does:** Sends **one beautifully formatted email per job** directly to your marketing team’s inbox.
* You can customize:

  * Subject line: `🚀 New Marketing Job Alert`
  * Recipients
  * Styling using HTML/Markdown

> 💌 *Your team receives curated, ready-to-review job leads — no searching required!*

---

# ✅ **Why This Workflow is Powerful for Any Beginner**

Even if you're new to automation, this setup helps you:

* 📬 Automatically deliver handpicked job listings
* 🤖 Use AI to do the heavy lifting (scraping, parsing, formatting)
* ⏰ Save hours every week for you or your team
* 🧩 Customize every part without code (n8n nodes are visual!)

---
